import { Props, Story, Preview } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";
import { Header} from '../../../../Components/Organisms/Mobile';

# Header

`import { Header, HeaderLeft, HeaderRight, HeaderBody } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Organisms/Mobile/Header";`


`Header` is a base for header in mobile. <br/>
Consists of `HeaderLeft` for container left side, `HeaderRight` for container right side, `HeaderBody` for container center side component in header.<br/>

## Stories
<br/>

### Header With Search and 2 Icons Right

`HeaderBody` as container of [SearchBar](/?path=/docs/molecules-search-bar--basic) and `HeaderRight` as container of 2 [Icon](?path=/docs/atom-icon--glyph) right.

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-mobile-header--search-2-icon-right"/>
</Preview>

### Header With Search and Right Action

`HeaderBody` as container of [SearchBar](/?path=/docs/molecules-search-bar--basic) and `HeaderRight` as container of  action [ButtonLink](/?path=/docs/atom-buttonlink--basic).

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-mobile-header--search-right-action"/>
</Preview>

### Header With Icon Left, Title, and Right Action

`HeaderLeft` as container of [ButtonLink](/?path=/docs/atom-buttonlink--basic) with [Icon](?path=/docs/atom-icon--glyph), `HeaderBody` as container of Title, `HeaderLeft` as container of  action [ButtonLink](/?path=/docs/atom-buttonlink--basic).

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-mobile-header--icon-left-title-right-action"/>
</Preview>

### Header With Icon Left, Title, and 2 Icon Right

`HeaderLeft` as container of [ButtonLink](/?path=/docs/atom-buttonlink--basic) with [Icon](?path=/docs/atom-icon--glyph), `HeaderBody` as container of Title, `HeaderLeft` as container of 2 [Icon](?path=/docs/atom-icon--glyph) right.

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-mobile-header--icon-left-title-2-icon-right"/>
</Preview>

### Header With Left Action and Search

`HeaderLeft` as container of [ButtonLink](/?path=/docs/atom-buttonlink--basic) with [Icon](?path=/docs/atom-icon--glyph) and HeaderBody` as container of [SearchBar](/?path=/docs/molecules-search-bar--basic).

<Preview>
  <Story id="organisms-mobile-header--left-action-search"/>
</Preview>

## Props
<Props of={Header}/>
